lead_paragraph: In these modern days the mementos of peacetime touring have become weapons of war. Dispatches from London tell us that the accurate bombing that wiped out Axis headquarters in Sicily just before the invasion was made possible by a tourist's photograph of the Taormina Hotel.
abstract: Ed on value of peacetime snapshots of strategic areas in wartime
